note.p: Education: Privately educated; Copenhagen; Berlin; Nuremberg; Altdorf; Halle; Kiel; Leyden (admitted 1713); Utrecht. LLD (1716)

Career: Travelled to Holland, England and France (1713-1716); Envoy from Nuremberg to Wetzlar (1717, 1721); Member of the Town Court (1728); Judge of the Court of Appeal (1748); benefactor of the University of Altdorf
Authority: Alternative surname from the Record
